article_title: Adrienne Iverson wins Hunter Derby in Lake Placid
article_text:
Plattsburgh, NY (12901)

Today

Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 78F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

og.description: Iverson rode Chapman ET to first place in a 24-horse field.
og.title: Adrienne Iverson wins Hunter Derby in Lake Placid
